rukus.text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa, arra o sashioite soto ni tsukaeru yo watashi ni meijiru no ka, muchinamono-tachi yo

Ware wa sudeni anata ni keiji shita. Anata izen no mono-tachi ni (keiji) shita yo ni. Moshi anata ga (jashin o ware ni) hai shitanaraba,(gense ni okeru) anata no okonai wa munashi mono ni nari, kanarazu shippai-sha to naru nodearu
Iya, arra ni tsukaete, kansha suru mono to nare

Kare-ra wa, arra o tadashi shikatade wa sonsu shinai. Shinpan no hi ni oite hakare wa, daichi no subete o hitonigiri ni shi, sono migite ni sho ten o maka reyou. Kare ni tatae are. Kare wa, kare-ra ga haisuru mono no Haruka-jo ni takaku ora reru
Rappa ga fuka reru to, ten ni aru mono mata ji ni aru mono mo, arra ga o nozomi ni nara reru mono no soto wa kizetsu shiyou. Tsugini rappa ga fuka reru to, miyo, kare-ra wa oki-jo tte mi mawasu

Sonotoki daichi wa omo no o hikari de kagayaki,(okonai no) kiroku ga oka re, yogen-sha-tachi to shonin-tachi ga susumidete, koseina hanketsu ga kare-ra no ma ni senkoku sa re,(sukoshi mo) futona atsukai wa sa renai
Hitobito wa, sono okonatta koto ni taishite, jubun ni mukui rareyou. Kare wa, kare-ra no itta subete o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
